Fairs Cup Winners by Country 6 Spain 4 England 1 Italy, Hungary, Yugoslavia Fairs Cup Runners-up by Country 4 England 3 Spain 2 Hungary, Italy 1 Yugoslavia, Belgium Fairs Cup Finalists by Country 9 Spain 8 England 3 Hungary, Italy 2 Yugoslavia 1 Belgium UEFA Cup/Europa League Winners by Country 14 Spain 10 Italy 9 England 7 Germany 4 Netherlands 2 Russia, Sweden, Portugal 1 Belgium, Turkey, Ukraine UEFA Cup/Europa League Runners-up by Country 9 Germany 8 England, Italy 5 Portugal, Spain, France 4 Scotland 3 Netherlands 2 Belgium 1 Yugoslavia, Hungary, Austria, Ukraine UEFA Cup/Europa League Finalists by Country 19 Spain 18 Italy 17 England 16 Germany 7 Portugal, Netherlands 5 France 4 Scotland 3 Belgium 2 Russia, Sweden, Ukraine 1 Yugoslavia, Hungary, Austria, Turkey Both Cups Winners by Country 20 Spain 13 England 11 Italy 7 Germany 4 Netherlands 2 Russia, Sweden, Portugal 1 Yugoslavia, Hungary, Belgium, Turkey, Ukraine Both Cups Runners-up by Country 12 England 10 Italy 9 Germany 8 Spain 5 Portugal, France 4 Scotland 3 Belgium, Hungary, Netherlands 2 Yugoslavia 1 Austria, Ukraine Both Cups Finalists by Country 28 Spain 25 England 21 Italy 16 Germany 7 Portugal, Netherlands 5 France 4 Belgium, Hungary, Scotland 3 Yugoslavia 2 Russia, Sweden, Ukraine 1 Austria, Turkey Consecutive Wins 3 Sevilla (2014-16) 2 FC Barcelona (1958/60) Valencia (1962-63) Real Madrid (1985-86) Sevilla (2006-07) Consecutive Finals 3 Valencia (1962-64) Sevilla (2014-16) 2 FC Barcelona (1958/60) Birmingham City (1960-61) Leeds United (1967-68) Borussia Mönchengladbach (1979-80) RSC Anderlecht (1983-84) Real Madrid (1985-86) Internazionale (1997-98) Sevilla (2006-07) Benfica (2013-14) The same pair of finalists have never returned for a repeat final. Birmingham City (1960-61) and Benfica SL (2013-14) lost consecutive finals. Leeds United (1968) (Fairs Cup) and Internazionale (1998) (UEFA Cup) won the final the year after losing. Valencia (1964) (Fairs Cup), Borussia Mönchengladbach (1980) and RSC Anderlecht (1984) (UEFA Cup) lost the final as holders.
